sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const About = () => { const [page, setPage] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3020/api/pages/1`) .then(respose => respose.json()) .then(data => { setPage(data.map(name => (

{name.content}

Learn about us

Payment Plans

Group Vacations

Gift Cards

Let us help you

Customer Support

FAQ

Find A Travel Agent

Work with us

Careers

Affiliate Program

Travel Agent Sign In

Policies

Privacy Policy

Baggage Policy

Bill of Rights

Copyright ©2020 Jimbo's Getaway Service

))); }); }, []); return (
{page}
) } export default About;
